    Function reference

    All functions

    dCGPD() pCGPD() qCGPD() rCGPD() pCGPD() qCGPD() rCGPD()
    Density, Distribution Function, Quantile Function and Random Generation for the Five-Parameter Compound Generalized Pareto Distribution (CGPD)
    GEVBayes0()
    Create a Posterior for a GEV Model
    RL(<GEVBayes0>)
    Return Levels and Credible Intervals for a Poisson-GP Model
    RL(<poisGPBayes>)
    Return Levels and Credible Intervals for a Poisson-GP Model
    RL(<poisGPBayes0>)
    Return Levels and Credible Intervals for a Poisson-GP Model "Poor Man's version".
    as.poisGPBayes0()
    Compute Return Levels using an Extreme-Value Model
    as.poisGPBayes0(<poisGPBayes>)
    Coercion Method
    autolayer(<predRL>)
    autolayer Method for Predictive Return Levels
    autoplot(<GEVBayes0>)
    autoplot Method for the "GEVBayes0" S3 Class
    autoplot(<RL.GEVBayes>)
    autoplot Method for the "RL.GEVBayes" S3 Class
    autoplot(<RL.poisGPBayes>)
    autoplot Method for the "RL.poisGPBayes" S3 Class
    autoplot(<poisGPBayes0>)
    autoplot Method for the "poisGPBayes" S3 Class
    autoplot(<predRL>)
    autoplot Method for Predictive Return Levels
    autoplot(<predRLList>)
    autoplot Method for a List of Prediction Results
    bever-package bever
    Bayes Extreme-Value
    checkParNames()
    Check a Candidate Vector or Parameter Names for an Extreme-Value Model
    credInt()
    Find a Credible Interval for a Given Unimodal Probability Distribution
    formatLevel()
    Format Levels of Confidence or Probabilities
    poisGPBayes()
    Poisson-GP Model with Bayesian Inference Results
    poisGPBayes0()
    Create a Posterior for a Poisson-GP Model
    predict(<GEVBayes0>)
    Predictive Quantiles or Return Levels for a GEV Model, typically a Model for Block Maxima
    predict(<poisGPBayes>)
    Predictive Quantiles or Return Levels for a EV Model of class "poisGPBayes".
    predict(<poisGPBayes0>)
    Predictive Quantiles or Return Levels for a EV Model of type Poisson-GP
    quant2GEV()
    Find GEV Parameters from Given Quantiles
    vcov(<Bayes0>)
    Covariance Matrix for a Fitted EV Model
